languages.text: "Вольный Торговец. Какая долгожданная встреча". {n}Вы едва видите через марево боли, однако голос ксеноса, разорившего ваш столичный мир, вы все еще хорошо помните. Лицо Маражая скрывает шлем, однако тон не оставляет ни единого сомнения в глумливой улыбке за забралом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Вольный Торговец". {n}Вы едва видите через марево боли, однако голос ксеноса, разорившего ваш столичный мир, вы все еще хорошо помните. Лицо Маражая скрывает шлем, однако тон не оставляет ни единого сомнения в глумливой улыбке за забралом.{/n} "Жизнь вас, мон-кай, ничему не учит. Кажется, что вам просто не терпится угодить в наши сети, м?"

languages.text: "Rogue Trader. A long-awaited meeting indeed." {n}You can barely see anything through the haze of agony but you still remember the voice well: the voice of the xenos who devastated your capital world. Marazhai's face is hidden behind a helmet, but his tone leaves no room for doubt: he is smirking.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец. Какая долгожданная встреча". {n}Вы едва видите через марево боли, однако голос ксеноса, разорившего ваш столичный мир, вы все еще хорошо помните. Лицо Маражая скрывает шлем, однако тон не оставляет ни единого сомнения в глумливой улыбке за забралом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}You can barely see anything through the haze of agony, but you still remember the voice well — the voice of the xenos who devastated your capital world. Marazhai's face is hidden behind a helmet, but his tone leaves no room for doubt: he is sneering.{/n} "You mon-keigh never learn. I am beginning to think that your kind is eager to step into our snares."

"Rogue Trader." {n}You can barely see anything through the haze of agony, but you still remember the voice well — the voice of the xenos who devastated your capital world. Marazhai's face is hidden behind a helmet, but his tone leaves no room for doubt: he is sneering.{/n} "You mon-keigh never learn. I am beginning to think that your kind is eager to step into our snares."

Marazhai's face is hidden behind a helmet but his tone leaves no room for doubt: he is sneering.{/n}

Marazhai's face is hidden behind a helmet but his tone leaves no room for doubt: he is sneering.{/n}

A long-awaited meeting indeed." {n}You can barely see anything through the haze of agony but you still remember the voice well: the voice of the xenos who devastated your capital world. Marazhai's face is hidden behind a helmet, but his tone leaves no room for doubt: he is smirking.{/n}

"Rogue Trader. A long-awaited meeting indeed." {n}You can barely see anything through the haze of agony but you still remember the voice well: the voice of the xenos who devastated your capital world. Marazhai's face is hidden behind a helmet, but his tone leaves no room for doubt: he is smirking.{/n}

languages.text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}. Nous nous rencontrons enfin. » {n}La douleur vous aveugle, mais vous reconnaissez cette voix : celle du xénos qui a dévasté votre monde-capitale. Le visage de Marazhai est dissimulé par un casque, mais son ton ne laisse aucune place au doute. Il jubile.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader. A long-awaited meeting indeed." {n}You can barely see anything through the haze of agony but you still remember the voice well: the voice of the xenos who devastated your capital world. Marazhai's face is hidden behind a helmet, but his tone leaves no room for doubt: he is smirking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}. Nous nous rencontrons enfin. » {n}La douleur vous aveugle, mais vous reconnaissez cette voix : celle du xénos qui a dévasté votre monde capitale. Le visage de Marazhai est dissimulé par un casque, mais son ton ne laisse aucune place au doute. Il jubile.{/n}

languages.text: “行商浪人，我一直期待与你见面。”{n}在痛苦的阴霾之中，你几乎什么都看不清楚，但你依然清楚地记得这个声音，就是这个异形摧毁了你的首都世界。玛拉斋的面孔藏在头盔后面，但他的语气确凿无疑——他是在幸灾乐祸。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader. A long-awaited meeting indeed." {n}You can barely see anything through the haze of agony but you still remember the voice well: the voice of the xenos who devastated your capital world. Marazhai's face is hidden behind a helmet, but his tone leaves no room for doubt: he is smirking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人，我一直期待与你见面。”{n}在痛苦的阴霾之中，你几乎什么都看不清楚，但你依然清楚地记得这个声音，就是这个异形摧毁了你的首都世界。玛拉斋的面孔藏在头盔后面，但他的语气确凿无疑——他是在嘲笑你。{/n}

languages.text: 「自由開拓者。待ちに待った再会だな」{n}苦悶の霧でほとんど何も見えないが、その声はよく覚えている。あなたの首都惑星を壊滅させた異種族の声だ。マラズハイの顔はヘルメットで隠れているが、その口ぶりが表すところは明白だ。彼は嘲笑している。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader. A long-awaited meeting indeed." {n}You can barely see anything through the haze of agony but you still remember the voice well: the voice of the xenos who devastated your capital world. Marazhai's face is hidden behind a helmet, but his tone leaves no room for doubt: he is smirking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者。待ちに待った再会だな」{n}苦悶の霧でほとんど何も見えないが、その声はよく覚えている。あなたの首都惑星を壊滅させた異種族の声だ。マラズハイの顔はヘルメットで隠れているが、その口ぶりが表すところは明白だ。彼は嘲笑している。{/n}

languages.text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ein lange erwartetes Treffen." {n}Der Dunst der Qualen verhindert, dass du etwas erkennst, aber die Stimme erkennst du trotzdem – die Stimme des Xenos, der deine Hauptwelt zerstörte. Marazhais Gesicht verbirgt sich hinter einem Helm, aber sein Tonfall lässt keinen Zweifel aufkommen – er grinst.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader. A long-awaited meeting indeed." {n}You can barely see anything through the haze of agony but you still remember the voice well: the voice of the xenos who devastated your capital world. Marazhai's face is hidden behind a helmet, but his tone leaves no room for doubt: he is smirking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ein lange erwartetes Treffen." {n}Der Dunst der Qualen verhindert, dass du etwas erkennst, aber die Stimme erkennst du trotzdem – die Stimme des Xenos, der deine Hauptwelt zerstörte. Marazhais Gesicht verbirgt sich hinter einem Helm, aber sein Tonfall lässt keinen Zweifel aufkommen – er grinst.{/n}

languages.text: «Comerciante Independiente. Por fin nos encontramos». {n}La agonía te impide ver con claridad, pero recuerdas perfectamente esa voz: es el xenos que arrasó tu mundo capital. Marazhai oculta su rostro bajo un casco, pero el tono de su voz no deja lugar a dudas: se está burlando de ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader. A long-awaited meeting indeed." {n}You can barely see anything through the haze of agony but you still remember the voice well: the voice of the xenos who devastated your capital world. Marazhai's face is hidden behind a helmet, but his tone leaves no room for doubt: he is smirking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Comerciante Independiente. Por fin nos encontramos». {n}La agonía te impide ver con claridad, pero recuerdas perfectamente esa voz: es el xenos que arrasó tu mundo capital. Marazhai oculta su rostro bajo un casco, pero el tono de su voz no deja lugar a dudas: está sonriendo.{/n}

languages.text: "Hür Tacir. Nihayet kavuştuk." {n}Çektiğin acının getirdiği kafa karışıklığı yüzünden gözün zor görüyor olsa da bu sesi iyi hatırlıyorsun: Başdünyanı harap eden zenonun sesi bu. Marazhai, yüzünü miğferiyle saklasa da sırıttığı, ses tonundan belli oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader. A long-awaited meeting indeed." {n}You can barely see anything through the haze of agony but you still remember the voice well: the voice of the xenos who devastated your capital world. Marazhai's face is hidden behind a helmet, but his tone leaves no room for doubt: he is smirking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir. Nihayet kavuştuk." {n}Çektiğin acının getirdiği kafa karışıklığı yüzünden gözün zor görüyor olsa da, bu sesi iyi hatırlıyorsun: Başdünyanı harap eden zenonun sesi bu. Marazhai yüzünü miğferiyle saklasa da, sırıttığı ses tonundan belli oluyor.{/n}
